replies.message:
EMINEM,
Someone has stolen your identity and getting people like me all excited over nothing. I served 20 years in the joint, grew up in there, came home and have been doing really good! I guess I was an easy target for this sort of scam. It's all good. I just thought you should know cause this cat has been making you look pretty bad to your fans, like a liar and quite frankly I don't think that's your style...

Here is YOUR alleged other page :https://www.facebook.com/eminemrapgod.shady?fref=nf
Here is my page: https://www.facebook.com/jay.guttentag
Here is the ALLEGED POST FROM YOU: https://www.facebook.com/eminemrapgod.shady/photos/a.109725299175578.18952.109491502532291/360703344077771/?type=1&theater
